attributes.action: to tell us what percentage of positve responses have been given to on-line petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be useful to know whether on-line petitions are yet another form of meaningless "consultation". Could the Prime Minister's office tell those of us who petition, what are the chances of a positive agreement to any on-line petition? Have any petitions resulted in a change to any piece legislation and, if so, can we be given the details.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
